abstract: Op-Ed article by former political prisoner Omar Abulqasim Alkikli describes joy he shared with fellow Libyans in Tripoli, celebrating news of Col Muammar el-Qaddafi's death.
snippet: Libyans celebrated the news of Qaddafi’s death with hope that it will bring a new beginning to the country.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: Libyans celebrated the news of Qaddafi’s death with hope that it will bring a new beginning to the country.

headline.main: In Tripoli, Blaring Horns and Shouts of Joy
headline.print_headline: In Tripoli, Blaring Horns and Shouts of Joy
headline.seo: In Tripoli, Jubilation at Qaddafi’s Death
